capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall makes a great Vice-President of Hogwarts. She's an excellent educator and leader, and I've always admired her dedication to the school.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of personality does mcgonagall have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Snape's family history and it's actually pretty fascinating. He comes from a mixed wizarding background, which is interesting because it shows that even in the wizarding world, people can come from different backgrounds and still achieve great things. I'm quite certain that this aspect of his heritage has had an impact on who he became as a person.
capsules_submitted.reply: i like it! so, snape's lineage is also a mix of magic and wizarding heritage, similar to harry's.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some non-magical heritage. I think that's what makes him so unique, you know? He's got the best of both worlds, but also faces some challenges because of it.
capsules_submitted.reply: i like it! so, harry's lineage is also a mix of both magical bloodlines, similar to severus snape's.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I've been thinking about Snape's family history and it's really interesting. He has a mixed lineage as a wizard, which is pretty unique. His mother was Merope Gaunt, who was a witch, and his father was Tobias Snape, who was also a wizard, but of unknown parentage. It's not entirely clear what his full heritage is, but it's definitely made him the person he is today.
capsules_submitted.reply: i like it! so, snape's lineage is also a mix of magic and wizarding heritage, similar to harry's.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix, right? I mean, he's got both Muggle and wizarding blood in him. That can be pretty complicated sometimes.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what are harry's hobbies?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that I can confirm.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.
